start.text: On a unusually calm Tuesday morning, you read through your spacemails and find one from an obscure administration you've never heard about - the PETTEE (Planetoid and Exoplanet Tenaciously Tactical Executive Embassy). #3vq8s7

first_mail_content.text: They complain about some form you were supposed to fill before being allowed to deploy a new species to the planet - one where you accept to be liable if any specimen of the species is found on another planet in the future. They're threatening you of legal repercussions if you don't pay penalties and fill the form immediately. #3irnqn

choices.text: “I'm pretty sure they're bluffing about these penalty to scare me into paying them. I'll just fill their form.” #t9vme0
“I can't stand losing time with any administration. I'll fill their form and pay the penalties.” #stpcoi

no_followup_scam_suspicion.text: It's been a while since you haven't had news from the PETTEE administration which was asking you to pay a fee for a missing form. Either it was an actual scam or maybe they're so disorganized they've forgotten about you. #hdyq1g

followup_scam_suspicion.text: You receive another spacemail from PETTEE, that allegedly legitimate administration who wanted you to pay them and fill a form. #be3f0c

choices.text: “These scammers don't give up easily, I'll give them that.” [keep ignoring their demands] #1laph0
“Maybe they're actually legit… I'd better do as they say.” #6jsb2u
Pretend you've filled the form after the first warning. #ma8h5k

pay_fine.text: You pay the fine and fill the form. #vrtsnh

manager_steps_in.text: You receive a call from your manager, who sounds… angry, to say the least. “What do you mean you haven't filled the PETTEE form? Everybody knows this is like the first thing to do when introducing a new species to a planetoid or an exoplanet! Do you also need me to check if you introduced a carnivorous species to a completely vegetal world? Just pay the dang fine and send them their form or I swear to God…” #i1ukfv

manager_steps_in_after_lie.text: You soon receive a call from your manager, who sounds… angry, to say the least. “Tell me why I'm getting calls from PETTEE about you lying that you've filled a form when their records clearly show it's not the case? Even interns know filling that form is like the first thing to do when introducing a new species to a planetoid or an exoplanet! Do you also need me to check if you introduced a carnivorous species to a completely vegetal world? Just pay the dang fine and send them their form or I swear to God…” #wbaedd

cool_clerk.text: You soon hear from an obviously very laid-back clerk from PETTEE. “Hey pal, seems like we've lost that form or whatevs, send it again plz” #0nduhg

choices.text: [Fill the form - seems like they've forgotten the fine] #gpx3i4
[Pay the fine and fill the form] #r9bpix

form_filled_fine_unpaid.text: PETTEE seems to have forgotten about you since you filled their form, even though you didn't pay their fine. #71xs1e

form_unfilled_fine_unpaid.text: PETTEE seems to have completely forgotten about you even though you neither filled their form nor payed their fine. #0ce8s9

pettee_demands_fine.text: You hear back from PETTEE. They acknowledge they've received the form but are still waiting for the payment of the fine. “*Sigh* I've underestimated them…” #7lmu4o

fine_paid_after_form_filled.text: You pay the fine after all. #e4dutw
